title: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015
text: Flights MSP LIT, STL April 2013 February 2015: Airline -time data flights departing arriving MSP, LIT, STL April 2013 February 2015. Also includes useful ‘metadata’ airlines, airports, weather, planes. Code adapted nycflights13. Feel free use /fork project!

title: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015
text: can install development version mspflights GitHub : using renv:

text: Changelog: See “Changelog” NEWS.md. Planned: TODO

title: Airport metadata — airports
text: Useful metadata airports.

title: Airport metadata — airports
text: data frame columns: faa FAA airport code. name Usual name airport. lat, lon Location airport. alt Altitude, feet. tz Timezone offset GMT. dst Daylight savings time zone. = Standard US DST: starts second Sunday March, ends first Sunday November. U = unknown. N = dst. tzone IANA time zone, determined GeoNames webservice.

title: Airport metadata — airports
text: https://github.com/jpatokal/openflights/blob/master/data/airports.dat, last updated 2019-05-13

title: Airport metadata — airports

title: Flights data — flights
text: -time data flights departed Minneapolis-Saint Paul International Airport (MSP), 2013-2015.

title: Flights data — flights
text: Data frame columns year, month, day Date departure. dep_time, arr_time Actual departure arrival times (format HHMM HMM), local tz. sched_dep_time, sched_arr_time Scheduled departure arrival times (format HHMM HMM), local tz. dep_delay, arr_delay Departure arrival delays, minutes. Negative times represent early departures/arrivals. carrier Two letter carrier abbreviation. See airlines get name. flight Flight number. tailnum Plane tail number. See planes additional metadata. origin, dest Origin destination. See airports additional metadata. air_time Amount time spent air, minutes. distance Distance airports, miles. hour, minute Time scheduled departure broken hour minutes. time_hour Scheduled date hour flight POSIXct date. Along origin, can used join flights data weather data.

title: Flights data — flights
text: RITA, Bureau transportation statistics, https://www.transtats.bts.gov/DL_SelectFields.aspx?gnoyr_VQ=FGJ&QO_fu146_anzr=b0-gvzr

what: mspflights: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015 — mspflights-package
title: mspflights: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015 — mspflights-package
text: Airline -time data flights departing arriving MSP, LIT, STL April 2013 February 2015. Also includes useful 'metadata' airlines, airports, weather, planes.

title: mspflights: Flights Between MSP and LIT, STL from April 2013 to February 2015 — mspflights-package
text: Maintainer: John Benninghoff jbenninghoff@mac.com (ORCID)

title: Plane metadata — planes
text: Plane metadata plane tailnumbers found FAA aircraft registry. American Airways (AA) Envoy Air (MQ) report fleet numbers rather tail numbers matched.

title: Plane metadata — planes
text: data frame columns: tailnum Tail number. year Year manufactured. type Type plane. manufacturer, model Manufacturer model. engines, seats Number engines seats. speed Average cruising speed mph. engine Type engine.

title: Plane metadata — planes
text: FAA Aircraft registry, https://www.faa.gov/licenses_certificates/aircraft_certification/aircraft_registry/releasable_aircraft_download

title: Plane metadata — planes
code: planes #> # A tibble: 3,132 × 9 #>    tailnum  year type              manufacturer model engines seats speed engine #>    <chr>   <int> <chr>             <chr>        <chr>   <int> <int> <int> <chr>  #>  1 N10156   2004 Fixed wing multi… EMBRAER      EMB-…       2    55    NA Turbo… #>  2 N102UW   1998 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  3 N103US   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  4 N104UW   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  5 N10575   2002 Fixed wing multi… EMBRAER      EMB-…       2    55    NA Turbo… #>  6 N105UW   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  7 N107US   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  8 N108UW   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #>  9 N109UW   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #> 10 N110UW   1999 Fixed wing multi… AIRBUS INDU… A320…       2   182    NA Turbo… #> # ℹ 17,820 more rows #> # ℹ 11 more variables: arr_delay <dbl>, carrier <chr>, flight <dbl>, #> #   tailnum <chr>, origin <chr>, dest <chr>, air_time <dbl>, distance <dbl>, #> #   hour <dbl>, minute <dbl>, time_hour <dttm>

title: Hourly weather data — weather
text: Hourly meteorological data MSP, 2013-2015.

title: Hourly weather data — weather
text: data frame columns: origin Weather station. Named origin facilitate merging flights data. year, month, day, hour Time recording. temp, dewp Temperature dewpoint F. humid Relative humidity. wind_dir, wind_speed, wind_gust Wind direction (degrees), speed gust speed (mph). precip Precipitation, inches. pressure Sea level pressure millibars. visib Visibility miles. time_hour Date hour recording POSIXct date.

title: Hourly weather data — weather
text: ASOS download Iowa Environmental Mesonet, https://mesonet.agron.iastate.edu/request/download.phtml.

title: mspflights 0.1.1
text: Maintenance updates

title: mspflights 0.1.0
text: Updated release -time data metadata flights departing MSP 2013-2015: Updated flights MSP departures 2013-2015 Updated airlines new flights data Updated airports documentation Updated planes new flights data Updated weather MSP 2013-2015 Updated examples Future releases add relevant departure data LIT, hubs (ATL, DTW, MEM, DFW, ORD), STL.

title: mspflights 0.0.1
text: Initial release implementing updated version nycflights13: Imported nycflights13 code data Updated nycflights13 data using tidyverse/nycflights13#53 Updated data current sources Code data cleanup Future releases create data travel MSP LIT, MSP STL April 2013 February 2015.
